hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about launching your online store with remix-i18n-boilerplate.

1.question: What is remix-i18n-boilerplate?
1.answer: A platform to launch your online store in just 2 clicks—no tech skills needed. Perfect for small businesses and local vendors.

2.question: Do I need technical skills?
2.answer: No! Our visual editor and templates make it easy for anyone to get started.

3.question: How fast can I launch?
3.answer: Most users are live in under 30 minutes.

4.question: What can I sell?
4.answer: Physical products, digital goods, or services—our platform supports all business types.

1.question: Is my site SEO and mobile-friendly?
1.answer: Yes, all sites are SEO-optimized and fully responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

2.question: Can I connect my own domain?
2.answer: Yes! Free plans get a subdomain, and paid plans allow custom domains.

3.question: What integrations are available?
3.answer: Integrate with payment providers, analytics, marketing tools, and more.

1.question: How much does it cost?
1.answer: Start free! Upgrade to Pro or Business for more features and no ads.

2.question: Are there transaction fees?
2.answer: Only standard payment processing fees apply—no hidden charges.

1.question: How do I get help?
1.answer: Access our help center, tutorials, or contact our friendly support team.

2.question: Can I export my data?
2.answer: Yes, you can export your store data anytime.
